instructions.title: Cross out numbers in pairs to clear the grid!

examples.text: Two of the same numbers can pair up.
Numbers can also pair if they add up 10.

instructions.title: For two numbers to pair, they have to be next to each other, or have no other numbers in between.

examples.text: These pairs are next to each other...

instructions.title: Finally, numbers on separate rows can be paired up if everything in between them is crossed out.

examples.detail: Just think of the grid as one big continuous row!
